GameToken.Name: menu_visible
GameToken.Description: Logic for showing the debug menu

GameToken.Name: lighting
GameToken.Description: Controls the lighting style. Standard, Flat (No Lights)

GameToken.Name: timeofday
GameToken.Description: Controls time of day. Afternoon, Evening, Night, Overcast, Interior

GameToken.Name: contrast
GameToken.Description: Controls contrast. Standard (100%), Low (50%), High (125%), Very High (150%)

GameToken.Name: clipping
GameToken.Description: Enables/Disables clipping. Clipping highlights pure whites and pure blacks.

GameToken.Name: wep_zoo.wep_rotation
GameToken.Description: Displays current selected weapon rotation Z value

GameToken.Name: wep_zoo.current_weapon
GameToken.Description: Displays name of current selected weapon entity
